summary: This document is a letter from TD Ameritrade to Jeffrey Epstein informing him of the termination of their business relationship. Epstein is instructed to either transfer his account to another brokerage or liquidate it by April 11, 2019. The letter outlines the restrictions placed on his account and the consequences of not complying with the instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the letter from TD Ameritrade, which informs him of the termination of his business relationship with the brokerage.

events.title: Termination of Business Relationship
events.description: TD Ameritrade notifies Jeffrey Epstein of the termination of his account and the need to liquidate or transfer it by April 11, 2019.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtrs Ste B-3 St Thomas, VI 00802-1348
keyFacts: TD Ameritrade has decided to terminate its business relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein must either transfer his account to another brokerage or liquidate it by April 11, 2019.
His TD Ameritrade account has been restricted to liquidating transactions only.
